sentence.Network_en: Violet's diary entry for 20 April 1917 records Brigit admitting to the affair.
sentence.Network_cn: 维奥莉特1917年4月20日的日记里记录着布里吉特承认了那桩风流韵事。

sentence.Network_en: Brigit did not ponder on these things too long.
sentence.Network_cn: 布丽吉德没花很长时间考虑这些事情.

sentence.Network_en: Brigit didn't ponder on things too long. The morning was too lovely for problems or gloom.
sentence.Network_cn: 布丽奇特对这些事情没有进行过多考虑. 如此可爱的早晨不宜思考问题或闷闷不乐.
